welcome-text: Welcome to renting-app, keep everything managed!
name: Name
slide-first: Welcome to the simple but pro rent app!
slide-second: You can easily track your renting business!
slide-third: This app is free to use!
stuffTooltip: You can manage you stuff (things to rent) here!
howManyDaysClaim: How many days want to rent
underDev: This site is under development! Please wait for final result!!!
needToBeReturned: Need To Be Returned Before Closing Contract

resp.401: You Are NOT Logged In, Please Sign In First
resp.1001: Items To Return Are More Than Remaining
resp.1002: Contract Is Closed Succuessfuly, So Cannot Be Changed!

hiw.two: If you run a rental business and need a seamless way to manage everything from start to finish, RSApp.ir is the perfect solution for you.
hiw.multLangDes: RSApp.ir supports multiple languages, with more being added soon.
hiw.respDesignDes: Works flawlessly on mobile, tablet, and PC.
hiw.freeToUseDes: Currently, RSApp.ir is free to use.
hiw.quickSetupDes: Create your store account and become the admin in less than a minute.
hiw.employeeUsersCreationDes: Admins can create custom user accounts for employees.
hiw.custManagementDes: Easily add new customers to rent items to.
hiw.inventoryManagementDes: Create and manage items you want to rent, such as tools, clothes, cars, and more.
hiw.contractManagementDes: Create and track contracts from open to close automatically.
hiw.returnManagementDes: Manage the return status of rented items within contract details.
hiw.paymentTrackingDes: Add and track payments for your contracts.

about.title: Welcome to RSApp.ir!
about.subtitle: Simplifying Rental Business Management
about.missionText: At RSApp.ir, we aim to streamline and simplify the management of rental businesses. Our platform offers a comprehensive suite of tools designed to make your rental operations more efficient and effective.
about.thankYouText: We would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to the technologies and platforms that made RSApp.ir possible:
about.microsoft: Microsoft .NET Framework: For providing a robust and scalable backend framework.
about.angular: Angular: For offering a powerful and flexible frontend framework.
about.github: GitHub: For enabling seamless version control and collaboration.
about.bootstrap: Bootstrap: For helping us create a responsive and visually appealing design.
about.explore: Explore our platform and see how RSApp.ir can transform your rental business management!
